H0.text: What is the name of both a tire company and a restaurant guide. Goodyear

H1.text: What is the name of both a tire company and a restaurant guide. Pirelli

H2.text: What is the name of both a tire company and a restaurant guide. Bridgestone

H3.text: What is the name of both a tire company and a restaurant guide. Michelin

A4.text: The Michelin Guides have been published by the French tire company Michelin since 1900.
